duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate incoming student admission process and support prospective families through the application process.
Support 8th graders and families throughout the high school placement process, including admissions and financial aid applications.
Assist 11th and 12th graders and families throughout the post-secondary path planning process.
Maintain department data using Salesforce and TADS databases.
Communicate effectively to internal and external stakeholders to promote the organization's mission.
Participate fully in the life of the organization and familiarize oneself with the community and religious affiliations.
